EmailTemplate.name: 2019.12.17 - ISO Holiday Campaign Eblast EM2.ISO Holiday Campaign EM2
EmailTemplate.subject: Congrats on your success
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
HiÂ {{lead.First Name:default=Valued Customer}},
With the holidays quickly on their way, I just wanted to alert you that from December 24th - December 27th and January 1st we will not be making any deliveries.
Just a quick reminder that I have put together a special promo for you to use before the holidays. The promo is called, HOLIDAY, and provides you with 15% OFF your order of $75 or more. You can use this promo code until December 20th, 2019 on anything except paper.
Make sure to sign in to your account at https://www.grandandtoy.com/Account/Logon <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/Account/Logon?cmp=PricePlan_PROMO&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> to place your order.
